title: Yui, from the series 53 Stations of the Tokaido
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription, and Seals

LR mar LLQ; URC
description: large bay behind a jagged, rocky outcropping; four boats with white sails at R; smaller black boats near center; Mt. Fuji rises in background at L; two travelers make their way down the side of a very steep cliff to take in the view; third traveler with huge pack continues up the path alone
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art and Culture
